title: Kinda Funny Studios Launch Teaser Trailer (DEBUT STREAM AUGUST 22nd!)
description:
Monday, August 22nd. 
http://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
10AM-10PM PT

New look. Same idiots.


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: We are the winners. Watch us swim with the champion. The champion champion. We are the champion. Let me let me
